channel.title: myObsidian
channel.generator: Webpage HTML Export plugin for Obsidian

item.title: madeiraPortimaoLog
item.description:
03/06/2024 , 10:20
Dist Total 0.00 NM, COG 68.72°, SOG 0.19 kts
AWS 4.7 kts ; AWA 307°

time to go! Cloudy, tiny wind from south.

03/06/2024 , 10:39
Dist Total 0.59 NM, COG 132.96°, SOG 3.15 kts
AWS 8.3 kts ; AWA 43°

Engine off straight away.
3kts in 8IKts wind. Nice!

03/06/2024 , 11:10
Dist Total 1.85 NM, COG 100.02°, SOG 4.23 kts
AWS 5.9 kts ; AWA 57°

No wind next to the cliffs, engine on

03/06/2024 , 13:39
Dist Total 11.68 NM, COG 82.41°, SOG 4.60 kts
AWS 17.4 kts ; AWA 281°

engine off

03/06/2024 , 17:24
Dist Total 29.48 NM, COG 52.76°, SOG 5.07 kts
AWS 16.0 kts ; AWA 280°

Getting into the swing of it again.
Windy off SE point of Madeira. ABout 16Kts now. Rice on.

03/06/2024 , 22:32
Dist Total 55.34 NM, COG 60.66°, SOG 5.38 kts
AWS 16.0 kts ; AWA 292°

Breezy dark night out there.
Boat on a mission gaining north.
Yacht 3Nm ahead means no alarm can be set

04/06/2024 , 08:11
Dist Total 101.47 NM, COG 86.90°, SOG 5.09 kts
AWS 13.7 kts ; AWA 277°

The usual big fruit breakfast. Wind upper teens true, veering slightly. Nice to get just a little northing in.
Tried Wfax, signal there but unreadable. Still getting FM radio, classic station on

04/06/2024 , 11:02
Dist Total 114.92 NM, COG 76.22°, SOG 4.61 kts
AWS 13.8 kts ; AWA 288°

Noon. Days run 115Nm.

04/06/2024 , 14:02
Dist Total 128.09 NM, COG 77.09°, SOG 4.13 kts
AWS 9.6 kts ; AWA 286°

Seamount ahead, turned a few degrees to stb to keep clear of the centre of it

04/06/2024 , 17:21
Dist Total 141.59 NM, COG 69.49°, SOG 4.11 kts
AWS 13.3 kts ; AWA 284°

Just coming up past seamount. 2 fishing boats over it, neither on AIS

05/06/2024 , 05:44
Dist Total 202.97 NM, COG 87.81°, SOG 4.68 kts
AWS 14.1 kts ; AWA 297°

Passed approx 2Nm in front to tug towing oil platform.
Radar alarm went off at 5Nm on 35% gain

05/06/2024 , 11:03
Dist Total 229.74 NM, COG 108.00°, SOG 6.07 kts
AWS 16.3 kts ; AWA 294°

Noon day 3
116Nm daily run

05/06/2024 , 16:10
Dist Total 255.13 NM, COG 85.82°, SOG 5.77 kts
AWS 20.6 kts ; AWA 297°

Wind up a little bit. Not loosing too much to the south so right now all is good! Forecast getting old but low due to come in with some west tomorrow. Hope so!

06/06/2024 , 06:52
Dist Total 323.12 NM, COG 98.43°, SOG 5.03 kts
AWS 20.1 kts ; AWA 290°

Puled out 2nd reef, dowen to 1. Wind down a bit.
Pressure drioping slowly, 1014.7.
Got very fuzzy +48 wfax last night, still looks like a low of bay of Cadiz so ghoping some south in the wind soon

06/06/2024 , 09:12
Dist Total 332.92 NM, COG 79.55°, SOG 3.85 kts
AWS 11.0 kts ; AWA 309°

Downloaded some useable wfax, look OK.
RMS wouldn't connect

06/06/2024 , 09:46
Dist Total 334.81 NM, COG 50.17°, SOG 4.08 kts
AWS 13.0 kts ; AWA 291°

Wind filled in a bit from NNW pretty much as the gribs said.
Nice to be getting some north in.

06/06/2024 , 11:02
Dist Total 339.44 NM, COG 66.05°, SOG 1.76 kts
AWS 10.2 kts ; AWA 286°

Noon day 4
119Nm days run.
Slow bashing into swell but generally right direction. Sunny

06/06/2024 , 14:53
Dist Total 351.76 NM, COG 36.75°, SOG 4.39 kts
AWS 15.8 kts ; AWA 293°

Wind up. 15ish. Bouncing along nicely in roughly the right direction. Happy music playing.

06/06/2024 , 15:17
Dist Total 353.70 NM, COG 42.57°, SOG 5.64 kts
AWS 17.3 kts ; AWA 297°

2nd reef in main

06/06/2024 , 19:50
Dist Total 374.89 NM, COG 37.37°, SOG 4.02 kts
AWS 13.0 kts ; AWA 297°

Downloaded wfax & got grib off ham. Winds forecast to be light but in right direction!
Shook 2nd reef out of main

07/06/2024 , 04:13
Dist Total 401.60 NM, COG 34.12°, SOG 4.31 kts
AWS 13.9 kts ; AWA 266°

Rolled in some yankee

07/06/2024 , 11:02
Dist Total 427.14 NM, COG 7.00°, SOG 2.36 kts
AWS 9.4 kts ; AWA 272°

Noon day 5
87Nm days run.
Very slow now but in right direction.

07/06/2024 , 19:31
Dist Total 457.32 NM, COG 15.07°, SOG 3.16 kts
AWS 11.1 kts ; AWA 258°

Pole out ready in case wind backs & need to go dead downwind.
Good afternoon sailing, calm & about 4.5kts.
Downloaded wfax with SOX on Pi & decoded in laptop opencpn, decent image but doesn't really match the grib. Time will tell.

07/06/2024 , 21:12
Dist Total 463.49 NM, COG 13.31°, SOG 3.84 kts
AWS 10.2 kts ; AWA 251°

night mode

08/06/2024 , 02:03
Dist Total 477.56 NM, COG 1.89°, SOG 3.45 kts
AWS 9.1 kts ; AWA 268°

Quiet night, windshift didnt happen. 3.5Kts gently north.
Couple ships way off to the SW.

08/06/2024 , 04:15
Dist Total 484.39 NM, COG 4.31°, SOG 2.37 kts
AWS 7.8 kts ; AWA 267°

AIS alarm during night check. More than 5Nm away W & crossed his bow already, all good. Looked like he turned to port a bit.

08/06/2024 , 11:01
Dist Total 502.47 NM, COG 354.11°, SOG 3.34 kts
AWS 10.4 kts ; AWA 266°

Noon. Day 6
75Nm days run. Beautiful quiet gentle sailing right now.
All's well on the ocean today.

08/06/2024 , 12:36
Dist Total 506.96 NM, COG 42.20°, SOG 3.40 kts
AWS 10.8 kts ; AWA 215°

Tacked yankee onto wind and wing. Rolling a bit but pyypilot steering well on true wind.

09/06/2024 , 00:59
Dist Total 554.16 NM, COG 23.33°, SOG 5.10 kts
AWS 5.3 kts ; AWA 278°

Engine on, just through TSS. wind died

09/06/2024 , 08:44
Dist Total 581.67 NM, COG nan°, SOG 0.27 kts
AWS 0.6 kts ; AWA 224°

Anchored in 8m. Very quiet
